positions.title: Data Science Intern
responsibilities: Solve Business related problems using data-driven techniques.
Create data-driven models for User Behavior, Sales, and Revenue.
Learn and apply knowledge of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence on projects.
Work closely with executives on frequent report updates, research, and development.

positions.title: Data Scientist
positions.location: Sydney, New South Wales, Australia · Remote
responsibilities: Developed a housing price forecasting model for suburban areas in Australia.
Processed council office documents using machine learning to enhance client services.
Created a platform for visualizing geographical states (flood-prone areas, deserts, populations) using Cesium & mapbox for map applications.
Implemented a generative design algorithm for producing floor plans and city plans.

positions.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Developed and optimised techniques for streaming data with cloud products.
Utilized time series analytics to create a pump run life analytics dashboard from well data.
Implemented a graph-based solution for identifying similarities in well analysis data.
Developed PPE detection system with real-time alerts using computer vision technologies.
Developed Majan IoT dashboard for efficient management of IoT devices.
